content:
Is there any officially assigned url for ICD-0-3 and ICCC-3 (International Classification of Childhood Cancer, third edition) code systems ?
I saw that in the mCODE guide and in THO ICD-O-3 is identified as http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/icd-o-3 ...
@Giorgio Cangioli PLEASE do not adjudicate this in zulip. Engage HTA - you do know that is the authoriuty on external code systems, ask them. @Carol Macumber @Julie James

Maybe HTA should have its own Zulip stream? Otherwise the terminology stream seems to be an appropriate place to ask for information and at least initial guidance - including pointers to the appropriate information and processes in HTA, when needed.
Thanks @Carmela Couderc I've been able to find a February jira item about ICD-0-3 (HTA-10) and nothing about ICCC-3. Is my search correct ?
BTW, what is the status of the february request on ICD-O-3 ?

Hi @Giorgio Cangioli It looks like a request has not been entered for ICCC-3, anyone can enter an HTA ticket requesting that they work with the stewards/owners of ICCC-3 to obtain a url. As to the status of HTA-10 (for ICD-O-3), I'll tag some HTA members here to see if they have an update. @Carol Macumber @Reuben Daniels @Julie James @Davera Gabriel @Susan Matney @Sylvia Thun @Roel Barelds
...because apparently 7 people need to be cc'd to follow up with one JIRA ticket for one url. #doesnotscale. :thinking:
Thanks May. I decided to include all HTA members because its summer, and many people are taking time off. It seems as though Giorgio would like to hear an answer soon, so I decided on this tactic.

ICD-O-3 : Draft HTA page for ICD-O-3 has been created and the JIRA ticket has been updated. Added to HTA 21/07/21 agenda for approval. NOTE: HTA endorsed URL is consistent with what was implemented in mCode IG and at THO.
ICCC: Will inquire with international HTA members regarding ICCC as it may be included in the larger conversation about WHO owned code systems that is in progress.

Carmela Couderc said:

Hi Giorgio Cangioli It looks like a request has not been entered for ICCC-3, anyone can enter an HTA ticket requesting that they work with the stewards/owners of ICCC-3 to obtain a url. As to the status of HTA-10 (for ICD-O-3), <....>

Thanks Carmela, I added also a Jira ticket for ICCC-3. Thanks also for pushing the ICD-O-3 forward :-)

Carol Macumber said:

ICD-O-3 : Draft HTA page for ICD-O-3 has been created and the JIRA ticket has been updated. Added to HTA 21/07/21 agenda for approval. NOTE: HTA endorsed URL is consistent with what was implemented in mCode IG and at THO.
ICCC: Will inquire with international HTA members regarding ICCC as it may be included in the larger conversation about WHO owned code systems that is in progress.

Thanks Carol.
